amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 3010 which allows funds to be expended for the low-income heating assistance program in fiscal year 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 3010 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 342 (Roll no. 59).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Conaway.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
